title: Help me build the definitive listðŸ“œ of Indian cities rated on 10 key parameters.
selftext:
A week ago I saw this tweet wherein the author asked his followers to rate their cities out of 10 on some parameters. It had 80k views.

The [tweet](https://twitter.com/marinebharat/status/1718624833397981321?s=19)

The comment section was a goldmine. So I went to work and built a bare bones platform to crowdsource data about Indian cities.

So here's the plan... ..

I want this to be a community thing. Your insights and ratings will make this platform awesome!

The data might be a bit rough around the edges, but hey, that's where you all come in! I've populated the dashboard with some dummy data..

Here's the [webapp](https://citysort.vercel.app)
